articles.description: Watch TV coverage, in-play clips and follow live text as Rangers meet Servette in the first leg of their Champions League third qualifying round.
articles.title: Watch: Rangers host Servette in Champions League qualifying

articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text and radio commentary as Oval Invincibles face Manchester Originals in the 2023 Men's Hundred.
articles.title: Oval Invincibles v Manchester Originals - watch, listen & follow text

articles.description: Northern Superchargers produce a superb comeback to beat Trent Rockets by three runs in a gripping match that comes down to the final ball.
articles.title: Superchargers beat Rockets on final ball

articles.description: Great Britain's Emma Finucane claims her first major title with gold in the women's sprint at the Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Finucane claims first major title in women's sprint

articles.description: West Ham United agree a £30m deal with Manchester United to sign defender Harry Maguire.
articles.title: West Ham agree £30m deal with Man Utd for Maguire

articles.description: Great Britain's Emma Finucane wins gold in the women's sprint final at the 2023 Cycling World Championships.
articles.title: 'Fantastic' Finucane wins sprint gold for GB

articles.description: Northern Ireland's Rory McIlroy and Jon Rahm of Spain have their places on the European team for this year's Ryder Cup confirmed.
articles.title: McIlroy and Rahm secure places on Ryder Cup team

articles.description: BBC Sport's chief football writer Phil McNulty makes his predictions for the 2023-24 Premier League season.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Who will finish where in 2023-24?

articles.description: Wolves confirm the appointment of former Bournemouth manager Gary O'Neil on a three-year contract.
articles.title: Wolves appoint O'Neil on three-year deal

articles.description: England's ability to find a way to win during the Women's World Cup has only added to the squad's belief, Lucy Bronze says.
articles.title: England squad have grown in belief - Bronze
